features: HIGH-QUALITY USB MICROPHONES FOR VERSATILE USE: Explore our range of USB microphones designed for various setups, including desktop and laptop computers. From standalone microphones to plug-and-play USB condenser mics, each offers superior audio quality for gamers, professionals, and casual users alike

DESKTOP MICROPHONE OPTIONS FOR IMPROVED PERFORMANCE: Elevate your setup with dedicated desktop microphones, perfect for dictation, gaming, or professional recording. Our selection includes specialized gamer microphones for PCs, ensuring crisp, clear audio with minimal interference

ENHANCE YOUR PC OR LAPTOP WITH EXTERNAL MICROPHONES: Transform your recording experience with external microphones tailored for laptops and PCs. With easy plug-in options and recording buttons, these mics are ideal for podcasting, Zoom meetings, or high-quality audio capture on various platforms.

PRECISION MICROPHONES FOR DIVERSE COMPUTER USE: Discover a suite of microphones catering to different needs, from laptop mics to those compatible with Mac and PC. Our USB podcast microphones guarantee seamless compatibility and exceptional sound reproduction

VERSATILE COMPUTER MIC OPTIONS WITH SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE: Our lineup of computer microphones spans standalone options and USB-connected devices, delivering exceptional audio clarity. Choose from a range of options, including zoom microphones, to enhance your PC or laptop recording experience

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium quality USB computer microphone with clear sound for smooth podcasting, chatting and recording. A crystal clear voice is very important for recording, podcasting, and chatting. This top-notch USB computer microphone is easy to install and very convenient to use with all its efficient features.

PLUG & PLAY Enjoy a hassle-free installation of this USB computer microphone. It has a built-in sound card so there is no need to install any drivers. Simply plug into the USB port and start using it. It’s fast and convenient. ADVANCED NOISE-CANCELING TECHNOLOGY You will have a very clear sound because of the built-in, high-performance CMTECK CCS 2.0 SMART CHIP for echo cancelation and noise reduction. The person on the other line will not be annoyed by background noise. Your recordings and conversations will be perfectly smooth and clear. FLEXIBLE GOOSENECK Move the microphone any way you want with its flexible gooseneck. This USB microphone is extra-long and has a 360-degree adjustable neck that is convenient and suitable for all your needs. Take advantage of the versatile neck of this microphone. MUTE BUTTON WITH LED INDICATOR Be in total control of your microphone. Mute/unmute your microphone anytime. It has a built-in indicator LED light to show the working status of the microphone. Avoid unnecessary noises by using the mute button is very easy to activate and deactivate.

Take advantage of the 2 wind muffs that filter the wind noise and the travel bag that protects your Zekpro USB microphone. The packaging box includes 2 wind muffs that remove wind noise when the microphone is being used. Your recordings and conversations will be uninterrupted and will be much clearer with microphone wind muffs. Bring your Zekpro USB microphone anywhere you go with the protective travel bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Microphone that works well
reviews.reviewText: This microphone came and boy how easy it was to get started without the need of downloading any hardware. Just plug in and your ready to go. It comes with a handy travel bag to easily keep safe when transporting. The construction is super solid and I love the flexibility of the goose neck to adjust to different height levels. Great for use when recording live to my YouTube or making videos or when connecting to my gaming systems. The sound quality is great and I love the mute button that has a led Light letting you know when it’s in use. Overall, I think this a great deal for anyone that wants quality at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What you can expect
reviews.reviewText: This is a basic mic with a mute button and adjustable neck.The mic when put in the bag that comes with it takes up a 3 inch x 3inch area, which makes it ideal for travel, Easy to fit in your carry on bags. Its not very expensive so if you lose it, its not something that you will worry about finding price wise.I tried this mic out on Video calls and a few home made videos. It work well for what it costed. Only one issue I had with the mic, It kinda makes your voice sound squeaky when you are right on top of it speaking into it. I tried to see if mute button made a sound when clicking it while making a video and I did not hear any clicking sounds.I paid 15.99 for this product. The product more than likely cost around 5 dollars to manufacture minus the cost for packaging,shipping and selling the product. Taking this in consideration its actually a good product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The microphone delivers good performance, and I appreciate the flexibility of its neck which allows for easy positioning within tight spaces and extension when necessary. The sound quality meets my expectations. However, the mute button is less visible than advertised; it's not as bright, making it difficult to discern whether it's activated or not in a well-lit room. It's somewhat easier to see with the lights off, but I intend to use it mostly with the lights on. Despite this, I'm satisfied with the microphone's overall function and feel it's worth the investment, so I'll be keeping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive microphone
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son so he can interact with his friends while playing games. I ordered at 4pm Saturday and received it Sunday at 3pm. Now that service. I love having Amazon Prime! They never disappoint! Now back to the microphone, he plugged it in and it worked immediately. He has a desktop computer. He’s 13 and has had terrible luck with microphones that are connected to headphones! But this microphone is a plug and play and it works like a charm. Don’t hesitate to buy this and the Price is Right!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a terrific little microphone!!!
reviews.reviewText: I thought it was going to be larger and more complicated .... I opened the bag and was so surprised !!! Just took it out, plugged it in, and started talking !! REALLY COOL ....!!! This little microphone is AMAZING ... Thanks to it’sCMTECK CCS 2.0 SMARTCHIP This little gem has a echo cancellation and noise reduction... usually found in more expensive units. The ZEKPRO USB Microphone studio voice recording w/ mute button also has a 360 adjustable neck that’s convenient for all your needs. The “mute” feature is great for recording podcasts and chatting. For portability, a travel bag is included. You’ve gotta get one of these ..... it costs next to nothing, and the quality is outstanding.... you will be quite surprised ...!! This is truly a lotta bank for your buck !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for a while...
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mic because I wanted a gaming mic just for fun and to voice call with friends on computer. At first, it was everything I could ask for. The sound production was good, it was sweet and simple and it even came with extra heads. Around 3 weeks after I received it, my friend started to say they heard some 'buzzing' noise. I figured it was their headphones because after readjusting it, it worked well. Now(around 10 days after i couldn't return it), I realized it must be internal damage, though I never was rough with it and let it stay at my desk only. The buzzing sound fluctuates from loud to quieter, even when I adjust the wiring. Overall was a good mic until that happened, I wanted to leave this in case someone wants to consider this might happen to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels sturdy and sounds clear
reviews.reviewText: Was looking around for a basic mic for a diy project and decided to give this one a try. For the price, this microphone feels well constructed. Overall it's pretty light in weight with most of the weight being in the base. The base has three rubber pads and feels substantial enough to keep it from tipping over.The recorded sound seems very clear. As for the quality of the sound that really depends on what you're expecting and the equipment you're using. I can't speak about the noise-cancellation capabilities it advertises because I'm not sure how exactly to test for that but I imagine it's comparable to other mics in this price range.A good no-frills microphone that works. It came in a nice sturdy box with a carrying sack. Only setup I had to do was to plug it into the usb slot. Windows picked up on it, installed what it had to install, and it started working.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound quality and value for money
reviews.reviewText: USB mic works great. When used for teleconferencing, callers on other end hear me loud and clear. Great value for money. You do hear a slight click or noise when using the mute button on the mic so I just use the mute button on the program instead. Nice that it comes with a carrying case and extra mic windscreens.

reviews.reviewTitle: As expected every thing is good
reviews.reviewText: Well received. Quality good. It’s small and portable. Perfect for video conference. I bought this so I can use my headphones with for conference calls. This microphone is the best alternative to save some bucks if already have some expensive headphones with poor microphone.

Overall decent quality, noise cancellation is good, no noticeable echo, only complaint is that the mute button light is very dim, making it hard to tell whether it's on or off, unless the room is dark.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for those occasional Zoom meetings.
reviews.reviewText: Slight amount of static but more than good enough for those dreaded zoom meetings. Only issue was with FireFox browser, as mics are disabled as the default setting. Nothing intuitive about the rather torturous path you have to follow to activate the mic for a particular website.Not to be confused with a high end studio mic. That sort of sound quality is just not there. Other than that fairly small, and easy to tuck away the 99.9% of the time it is not in use.

This is not a professional recording mic, so not sure why people would expect it to be like one.This is a good little mic for desktop computers. on/off mute is nice to have so you can click it on and off instead of trying to click mute on zoom/chat or whatever you use.easily move around to where you need it and is much much better than using a laptop built in mic, or a webcam built in mic.
